snippet: ANGELO--John. The Damon Runyon Cancer Research Foundation community is deeply saddened to lose a brilliant, generous and kind friend. He will be greatly missed. Our hearts go out to John's family, countless friends and colleagues. Alan Leventhal, Chairman Lorraine Egan, President 1/3
